level.heading: Prospective application.
level.text: This chapter applies to any electronic record or electronic signature created, generated, sent, communicated, received, or stored on or after [October 3, 2001].

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 15-105 validated previously made technical corrections.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 3202(b) of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Electronic Transactions Act (1999 Act).
